title: Did Barbara Bush Say Living in the Astrodome Was ‘Working Very Well’ for Hurricane Refugees?
subtitle: Barbara Bush reportedly said that Hurricane Katrina refugees being housed in the Astrodome were 'underprivileged anyway, so this is working very well for them.'
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Former first lady Barbara Bush said that Hurricane Katrina  refugees being housed in the Houston Astrodome were "underprivileged anyway, so this is working very well for them."
